library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)

wks <- seq(ymd('2020-08-24'), ymd('2020-11-20'), by = 'day')

assns <- tibble(assn = NA, wks) %>% 
  mutate(day = weekdays(wks), wkno = week(wks))
assns %>% filter(day == "Friday") %>% 
  mutate(assn = case_when(
  wkno == 36 ~ 1, 
  wkno == 38 ~ 2,
  wkno == 40 ~ 3,
  wkno == 42 ~ 4,
  wkno == 44 ~ 5
))
